divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home heading east in Corona noticed what looked like a jet trail situated vertically in the western sky over the hills. At first I thought it was just a cloud, (strange though that it was vertical) but when I got out of my car at home I noticed it was moving and the trail was vertical to what must have been quite a large falling object. As we watched the object fall it moved in a more southerly or horizontal direction. We could see thru binoculars that it appeared to be a very large object that might perhaps go on to land in the ocean. We finally lost sight of it when it went behind the hills near our house. There were a couple of airplanes in the area, they must have seen this too. But there has been nothing on the news, and besides my husband, son, and our neighbor I haven't talked to anyone else who saw this.
Summary: Object falling out of the sky
trends: There have been 36 other sightings in Corona
There were no other sightings in Corona on or around February 26th 2008
